changes.description:
Added a reverse-topological knowledge index to aid in code generation for
languages that require types to be defined before they are referenced.

Added the `@httpResponseCode` trait to indicate that a structure member
represents an HTTP response status code.

Added (unstable) support for generating a "Trace File" to link code generated
artifacts back to their modeled source.
Added the `:topdown` selector that matches shapes hierarchically.

Added validation for the `cloudTrailEventSource` property of the
`@aws.api#service` trait.

Updated shape builders to properly update their member ShapeIds if the ShapeId
of the builder changes.
Added several more XML related protocol tests.

Fixed a bug where the `PaginatedIndex` did not properly support resolving
paths.

Clarified the documentation for the `cloudTrailEventSource` property of the
`@aws.api#service` trait.
Clarified that the `@aws.api#arn` trait has no impact on OpenAPI conversions.
